name: End-to-End AI Finance Solution
description: Comprehensive AI solution covering every stage of financial operations — from daily cash management through strategic planning — with 15 specialized AI Workers across Cash Operations, Accounting & Reporting, and Planning & Analysis.
keyBenefit: 60% faster close cycle and 12 fewer days DSO
overview: Transform your entire finance function with 15 specialized AI Workers designed for maximum impact across Cash Operations, Accounting & Reporting, and Planning & Analysis. Close in days instead of weeks, answer any financial question in hours instead of days, and turn your finance team from scorekeepers into strategic advisors.

connectors.name: SAP / Oracle / NetSuite
connectors.description: ERP system access for GL, AP, AR, and subledger data

connectors.name: Banking Platforms
connectors.description: Direct bank feeds for cash position and payment execution

connectors.name: Salesforce / CRM
connectors.description: Revenue data and customer payment history for O2C

memories.name: Vendor Master Data
memories.description: Vendor details, bank accounts, payment terms, and discount schedules

memories.name: Approval Hierarchies
memories.description: Invoice, payment, and journal entry approval routing rules

memories.name: Accounting Policies
memories.description: GAAP/IFRS policies, accrual rules, and allocation methodologies

memories.name: Regulatory Calendar
memories.description: Filing deadlines, jurisdiction requirements, and XBRL taxonomies

collections.name: Invoice Templates
collections.description: Standard invoice formats for AP ingestion and O2C generation

collections.name: Report Templates
collections.description: Board package, management report, and variance commentary templates

collections.name: Close Checklists
collections.description: Period-end task lists with owners, dependencies, and deadlines

collections.name: SOX Control Matrix
collections.description: Control definitions, testing procedures, and evidence requirements

workflows.name: Cash Operations Suite
workflows.description: AP, O2C, Cash Flow Management, Treasury Operations, and Payment Processing workers

workflows.name: Accounting & Reporting Suite
workflows.description: R2R, Financial Close, Consolidation, Compliance & Audit, and Regulatory Reporting workers

workflows.name: Planning & Analysis Suite
workflows.description: FP&A, Budget Modeling, Variance Analysis, Board Reporting, and Scenario Planning workers
